project.name: Atlas Mobile
project.scope: Cross-platform app, feature flags, offline sync

sections.title: Project Context & UX Role
sections.goal: Understand the interviewee's role in Atlas Mobile and how UX integrates with cross-platform development in a pilot phase.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your primary responsibilities on Atlas Mobile during this pilot phase?
How does the UX team collaborate with engineering and product for feature flag rollouts?
What unique constraints have you encountered designing for offline sync?

sections.title: Design System Integration
sections.goal: Explore how the DS-ATLAS v2 tokenized components are influencing design and development workflows.
sample_questions: How have tokenized components changed your approach to maintaining consistency across platforms?
Can you share an example where the design system accelerated a complex feature delivery?
What accessibility considerations are baked into DS-ATLAS v2?

sections.title: Accessibility & Inclusivity
sections.goal: Dive into accessibility strategies and how they are applied in mobile UX for regulated industries.
sample_questions: What accessibility standards or guidelines are you following for Atlas Mobile?
How do you test offline sync scenarios with assistive technologies?
Have you identified any gaps in current accessibility tooling for mobile?

sections.title: Cross-Functional Collaboration
sections.goal: Understand how UX coordinates with SRE, QA, and Security teams given the company’s values and policies.
sample_questions: How do UX decisions feed into risk-based testing as per POL-QA-014?
Can you describe a time when UX changes impacted the ‘Safety First’ principle?
What’s the process for incorporating security feedback into UI flows?

sections.title: Pilot Learnings & Scaling Strategy
sections.goal: Discuss lessons learned in the pilot phase and plans to scale Atlas Mobile to production.
sample_questions: Which pilot findings have had the biggest impact on your scaling strategy?
How will you adapt the offline sync model for a larger user base?
What risks do you foresee in scaling, and how are you addressing them?
